Record.Synonym: Icelandic Type Hereditary Cerebral Amyloid Angiopathy
Dutch Type Hereditary Cerebral Amyloid Angiopathy
Record.Description: A familial disorder marked by AMYLOID deposits in the walls of small and medium sized blood vessels of CEREBRAL CORTEX and MENINGES.
